description:
Free and Eruka are perilously close to releasing Asura - close enough to witness a terrifying display of the Kishin’s madness and power.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Fuuin no Yashiro: Fujimi no Otoko ga Shikaketa Karakuri?
Il santuario del sigillo. La trappola preparata dall`uomo immortale?
Le sanctuaire du scellé. Le piège laissé par l`immortel ?
The Seal Shrine: The Immortal Man`s Tricks?
封印の社 ~不死身の男が仕掛けたからくり?~
